hero.name: Ashis Jena
hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.content: I am a passionate Senior Software Engineer with over 7+ years of experience in crafting advanced user interfaces. Proficient in responsive UI design, microfrontend architecture, and performance optimization, I specialize in creating seamless user experiences that drive business growth and innovation in web development.

about.heading: About Me
about.content: I am a dedicated Senior Software Engineer with a strong focus on frontend development. With over 7 years of professional experience, I have honed my skills in building advanced, responsive user interfaces and scalable web applications. My expertise includes microfrontend architecture, performance optimization, and full-stack development. I am passionate about leveraging modern technologies to deliver high-quality solutions that enhance user interaction, improve system efficiency, and drive business growth.

content.description: Spearheaded the implementation of microfrontend architecture, reducing app load time by 80% and improving scalability. Led the development of a Flutter-based mobile app, increasing user acquisition by 25%. Integrated Google OAuth, reCaptcha, and Firebase Cloud Messaging for seamless user onboarding and enhanced security.

Designed and developed end-to-end solutions using Vue.js and Spring, improving system efficiency by 35%. Contributed to internal libraries and mentored offshore teams, accelerating development by 30% and enhancing code quality.

Designed and developed responsive web applications using React and SASS, improving cross-platform compatibility by 60%. Streamlined the development process by optimizing API workflows, reducing integration time by 30%.

Developed a full-stack finance report generation application, increasing report accuracy by 45% through optimized database queries and efficient backend logic. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver comprehensive solutions.

content.title: Ad Generative Tool
content.description: Developed an AI-powered tool for generating ad campaigns and logo designs, reducing ad creation time by 70% and increasing campaign effectiveness by 40%.

content.title: Next Bizongo Platform
content.description: Architected and implemented the core structure for a new e-commerce platform, utilizing microfrontend architecture to improve scalability and reduce time-to-market by 50%.

content.title: Symphony Retail AI Solutions
content.description: Designed and developed end-to-end solutions using Vue.js and Spring, improving system efficiency by 35%.

content.title: iPromoteU Web Applications
